name: Complete Control
description:
WARNING: This game may get tedious and boring after a while. This game is all about organization and endurance. You have been warned!

In everyday life, humans don't typically realize that they are blinking. Or breathing. Or that their tongue is in a comfortable position. (Don't sue me because of that.)

You get the job of being the subconscious part of the brain - the one that monitors every automatic muscle.

Manually make the heart beat, make your human breath, make the human feel hungry, make the human feel thirsty, and most importantly, attempt to make the human go to work to get money to feed the hunger and the thirst.
